title: Insight
description: INSIGHT is the second book in the INTWINE Saga. It is the continuing story of eighteen year old Juliette Greenmoss of Burbank, California. Just as Juliette is almost comfortable with the fact that the person she's fallen in love with, Seth Morrison, is from a planet 55,000 light years away, she learns more shocking details about his life and the nature of the galaxy. Forces of good and evil converge in this galactic adventure and Juliette must confront more evil than she ever imagined when the love of her life suddenly disappears.
author: Christina Moss
